title: Magazine Font ID (2)
content:
Hi again,

Also looking for ID on this  
Font (circled in 'red').

Thanks again.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112347im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Magazine_2_4121.jpg)

Font: 

 Myriad (Bold) 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112347/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: tm6464

comments.content:
Too few letters to be sure, but it could be a further emboldened **[Myriad (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112347/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=Myriad%20-%20Bold&fid=96755feef896df9bdda80da3ea38e096&fsize=60&text=Outdoor&fit=1)**

(but please, do not put this red oval over the letters - it destroys part of the image which could be useful to id the font. Just say which word/phrase want to be identified)
